hints: This Pokemon's name is derived from the word 'genetics'
It was created by cloning Mew
It's known as the most powerful Pokemon in the first generation
This Pokemon can learn every TM and HM
It's said to contain the DNA of every Pokemon
It's number 151 in the original Pokedex
This Pokemon's name is a play on 'char' and 'lizard'
It evolves into Charmeleon
It's one of the original starter Pokemon
This Pokemon's name comes from 'squirt' and 'turtle'
It evolves into Wartortle
It's a Water-type starter Pokemon
This Pokemon's name is a combination of 'bulb' and 'dinosaur'
It evolves into Ivysaur
It's a Grass/Poison-type starter Pokemon
This Pokemon's name is a combination of 'pika' (a mouse-like animal) and 'chu' (the sound of squeaking)
It evolves from Pichu
It's the mascot of the Pokemon franchise
This Pokemon's name comes from 'jinx' and 'ice'
It's known for its human-like appearance
It's an Ice/Psychic-type Pokemon
This Pokemon's name is a play on 'psychic' and 'duck'
It's known for holding its head due to constant headaches
It evolves into Golduck
This Pokemon's name comes from 'magic' and 'carp'
It's known for being incredibly weak
It evolves into Gyarados
This Pokemon's name is a combination of 'geodetic' and 'dude'
It's often mistaken for a rock
It evolves into Graveler
This Pokemon's name is a play on 'sleep' and 'fax'
It's known for always being asleep
It evolves into Hypno
This Pokemon's name comes from 'ghastly'
It's made entirely of gas
It evolves into Haunter
This Pokemon's name is a combination of 'onyx' (a type of rock) and 'snake'
It's known for its rock-hard body
It evolves into Steelix
This Pokemon's name is a play on 'execute'
It's a group of eggs with faces
It evolves into Exeggutor
This Pokemon's name comes from 'digit' and 'trios'
It's made up of three Diglett
It's the evolved form of Diglett
